name: Adjustable Bench
description: The adjustable weight bench is ideal for working out and training on your chest, shoulders, back, abs, and more.

name: Dumbbells
description: Dumbbells are used to strengthen the body and to tone the muscles, along with increasing their size.

name: Gym Bike
description: Riding a stationary bike can help build strength in your legs and lower body, especially if you use a higher resistance.

name: Flat Bench Press
description: The flat bench press involves both portions of the pectoralis major muscle but focuses on the lower head.

name: Exercise Ball
description: A usually large, inflated plastic or rubber ball used especially for strengthening muscles and improving posture and balance.

name: Treadmill
description: A treadmill is a piece of exercise equipment that has a belt that loops around, driven by a motor.
